definition: meager/slight/weak/ungenerous or unkind/frivolous/to despise/to belittle/to look down on/to approach or near

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: During that project, the new torch was carefully covered with thin sheets of 24k gold.
sentences.chinese: 在修复工程中，新的火炬由24K纯金薄片仔细覆盖。

sentences.english: I highly recommend laminating your perforated film with a premium optically clear film laminate.
sentences.chinese: 我强烈建议将穿孔贴膜用优质光学层压制件卷成薄片。

sentences.english: To julienne meat means to cut the meat into very thin slices.
sentences.chinese: 要切丝的肉类切成薄片的肉非常。

sentences.english: You had better slice the apple for the baby.
sentences.chinese: 你最好为小孩儿把苹果削成薄片。

sentences.english: Peel and slice the avocado and add to bowl with watercress.
sentences.chinese: 把鳄梨去皮切薄片，和豆瓣菜一起放入碗中。

sentences.english: These etchings form the paths that electricity follows in the chip.
sentences.chinese: 这些蚀刻版画形成路径电在薄片中跟随。

sentences.english: He was about to slice three green apples.
sentences.chinese: 他正要把三个青苹果切成薄片。

sentences.english: Tarragon cured salmon carpaccio, lightly smoked, Williams pear puree, organic celery shoots.
sentences.chinese: 龙蒿草烟熏三文鱼薄片，威廉生梨酱，有机西芹苗。

sentences.english: Calculation result demonstrates the energy consumption for preparing micron flake wood fiber is low.
sentences.chinese: 结果显示，微米级长薄片木纤维切削功率较低。

sentences.english: By policy, the police impolitely sliced the politician' s politics books.
sentences.chinese: 凭据政策，警方不客气的把政客的书籍切成了薄片。

sentences.english: Cut pork into thin slices and arrange on a plate.
sentences.chinese: 肉冷透后，用利刀片成薄片，排放碟上。

sentences.english: Yes, I agree that the sheet is  upside down.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我认为那些薄片是颠倒的。

sentences.english: As the sheets dry out, overlapping edges “felt” together to become fused seams.
sentences.chinese: 当薄片干掉以后，重叠的部分接合在一起。

sentences.english: Thinly peel the carrot and cut the pickled chilli into small pieces. Rinse and slice cucumber.
sentences.chinese: 将洗净的胡萝卜刨成薄片，泡椒剪成小段。

sentences.english: Green onions cut into 3 cm-long segment, ginger cut into thin slices.
sentences.chinese: 大葱切成3厘米长的段，姜切成薄片。

sentences.english: The beef is roasted in an oven until cooked and then sliced into thin slices.
sentences.chinese: 牛肉在烤箱里烤熟后切成薄片。

definition: to cut up (into pieces)/to slice/to carve/to dice/to shred
to slice/slice/thin section of a specimen (for microscopic examination)
to peel/to remove the skin/to tare
chunks obtained by repeatedly cutting a vegetable diagonally and rotating the vegetable after each cut
